name: Planet volley 34
description:
Planet volley 34 is a volleyball game inspired by the game “Blobby volley” developed by Daniel Skoraszewsky and Silvio Mummert.

It is played in 1 against 1 on the same machine.

The basic rules of the game are in place but some bugs remain (in particular a problem related to the refresh rate of the screen. It is advisable to play it on a screen refreshing at 144hz if possible).

Create with Love2D in LUA.

Goal of the game :

Drop the ball into the opponent's area. The first to reach 3 points wins the game.

Controls :

Player 1: Q and D to move left to right. Z to jump

Player 2: Left and right arrow to move left to right. Up arrow to jump

In general: Esc to pause the game. Space to reset the game.

The planets were generated thanks to the “Pixel Planet Generator” created by Deep-Fold. Generator: Pixel Planet Generator
